The AGO X e-bike normally goes for $2,499 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen taken down to this rate over the year, with some occasional drops lower to $1,899. This is the first bundle with the Tenways Power Bank ($309 value), however, giving you a total of $1,116 savings, which is the biggest deal we’ve tracked to date. items.title: If you somehow don’t have a copy of Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury, it’s now 34% off at Amazon
items.summary:
Alongside some hangover Prime Day PS5 and Switch game deals below, we also spotted a rare discount on digital copies of Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury at Amazon down at $39.88 – this deal is also matched at Walmart. Regularly $60, you’re looking at 34% in savings and price that undercuts the $44.99 we have been tracking on physical copies at Woot for quite some time now (this is the lowest price we can find for a boxed copy right now). While this is obviously not a new Mario release, it is the definitive version of the game and still a wonderful play through with the bonus Bowser’s Fury experience tacked on – it is almost like a game of its own. Every Switch gamer should have a copy of this one id you ask me, and now’s your chance to do so.

items.title: Logitech’s POP ICON keyboard and mouse combo for Mac, Windows, ChromeOS, more just hit a new all-time low at $50
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s POP ICON keyboard and mouse combo in Graphite down to $49.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This is originally a $70 combo that has lately been sitting at the $67 mark. Today’s deal shaves a solid $17 off its usual going rate to mark the lowest price we have tracked for it – essentially bringing the cost down to what you’d normally pay for the keyboard alone. We saw this combo in Lilac drop to the $52 mark earlier this year in April, but today’s beats that by an additional $2 discount. The same combo in off white is also down to $50.36 shipped with the on-page coupon, though the other variants are all fetching their full prices. Head below for more details.

more…
